name: Promenade (Christmas gift)
description:
We are currently having a speedrun contest with prizes to win. Send us your best time (with a screenshot). The first and 2d fastest contenders will win posters signed by the dev team!
Contest will end 22/01/2021.

####################

This is an early alpha and does not represent the quality of the final game.

The demo is treated as a simple platformer, but Promenade is way more than that.
It's a 2d collectathon including puzzles, bosses, a whole lot of secrets and is more focused on non-linear exploration.

The game is still in developpement and will be out in 2022.

Be sure to follow us on :

Instagram
Twitter
Facebook

Have fun and Merry Christmas
